Reviews.Title: “Served its purpose but not great...”

Reviews.Content: stayed quentin stag party 10 attending berlin beer festival hotel nice minutes walk quiet little bar mins walk adenauerplatz metro stop additionally bigger id expect major city downside corridors leading tlc beds uncomfortable pillows nonexistent drinking day especially couldn’t fathom radiator directly shower recommend hotel friend lads stag prob yes cheapness location travelling significant family chance
